page.content: Haggs Castle Golf{Club}has held the Glasgow Classic Golf Tournament twice, the third coming up in 1985. The tournament attracts players from all over Europe e.g. Ken Brown, Bernard Langer. It is an 18 hole course set in very nice surroundings, next to Pollok Estate.
